pullRequest.title: KAFKA-9650: include human readable units in ms and bytes configs

nodes.bodyText: The prefix for kilo, is lowercase k
Do we need this extra variable? It seems like defaultValueBytes is not used
I wonder if using Durations would make this more readable. For example Duration.ofDays(1).toMillis() instead of 1000L * 60 * 60 * 24. WDYT?

commit.message: KAFKA-9650: include human readable units in ms and bytes configs
Remove = and spell out memory units
